original_text: Then Joab's soldiers arrived and they started to attack Abel Beth Maakah. They made their camp all around the city. They built heaps of earth against the city's walls. They started to dig holes through the walls to cause them to fall down.
korean_text: 이에 그들이 벧마아가 아벨로 가서 세바를 에우고 그 성읍을 향한 지역 언덕 위에 토성을 쌓고 요압과 함께 한 모든 백성이 성벽을 쳐서 헐고자 하더니

sentences.original_text: and they started to attack Abel Beth Maakah
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아벨 벧 마아카를 공격하기 시작했으며

sentences.original_text: They made their camp all around the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 성 주변에 진영을 쳤고

sentences.original_text: They built heaps of earth against the city's walls
They started to dig holes through the walls
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 성벽을 통과할 구멍들을 파기 시작했고

sentences.original_text: to cause them to fall down
